question: Indian Sign Language Research and Training Center (ISLRTC) functions under the aegis of which Union Ministry?
option2: Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment
option3: Ministry of Women and Child Development
answer: Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment
explanation:
Indian Sign Language Research and Training Centre (ISLRTC) functions under the Department of Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities, Divyangjan under the Ministry of Social Justice & Empowerment.
A Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) has been between the ISLRTC and National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT) to make educational materials such as NCERT Textbooks and Teachers Handbook accessible for hearing impaired children in their preferred format of sign language.
